title: Suite 269
description: Leave your inhibitions at the door and make your fantasies come true.Three weeks.No rules.Any fantasy.Anything goes.Lexa Novak would like nothing better than to let go and finally experience it all, so when the opportunity arises to just do that, she can't refuseâ€”won't refuse.But what happens when your fantasies become your realities?Find out when you enter Suite 269.
author: Christine Zolendz
